hadiths.text: Narrated 'Urwah bin Al-Mugirah bin Shu'bah: From his father: "The Prophet (ﷺ) wore a Roman Jubbah with tight sleeves." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي لُبْسِ الْجُبَّةِ وَالْخُفَّيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Wearing A Jubbah And Khuff
